mapper.select: select type, count(type) as count from sys_message where read = #{read} and receiver = #{receiver} group by type

select sm.*, va.attr_name typeName, su.username senderName, su2.username receiverName from sys_message sm left join sys_user su on sm.sender = su.id left join sys_user su2 on sm.receiver = su2.id left join ( select attr_value, attr_name from v_sys_dict_attr where dict_code = 'message-type' ) va on va.attr_value = cast(sm.type as varchar) where 1=1
and content like concat('%', #{content}, '%')
